description: This is a source file defining API service functions for handling purchase-related API calls in a frontend application. It provides functions to list, create, retrieve, update, and delete purchase records, corresponding to REST API endpoints.

methods.name: listPurchases({ skip = 0, limit = 10, payment_status, delivery_status, supplier_name } = {})
methods.description: Fetches a list of purchases, with optional filters such as skip, limit, payment_status, delivery_status, and supplier_name.

methods.name: createPurchase(payload)
methods.description: Creates a new purchase record with the provided payload.

methods.name: getPurchase(purchaseId)
methods.description: Retrieves details of a specific purchase identified by purchaseId.

methods.name: updatePurchase(purchaseId, payload)
methods.description: Updates an existing purchase identified by purchaseId with the provided payload.

methods.name: deletePurchase(purchaseId)
methods.description: Deletes a purchase record identified by purchaseId.

ctags.name: listPurchases
ctags.pattern: /^export async function listPurchases({ skip = 0, limit = 10, payment_status, delivery_status, sup/
